**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Clarity Golden Perfection Jade Sovereign’s Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Departments* (abbreviated as *The Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Mysterious Register*).

Author unknown, approximately composed between the late Northern and Southern Dynasties or the early Tang. Falsely attributed to the Supreme Venerable Jade Dawn Lord bestowing it upon the Seven Perfected of Golden Radiance.

One scroll. Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Orthodox Section, Part One.

---

**The Supreme Clarity Golden Perfection Jade Sovereign’s Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Departments**

Golden Radiance said: In the *guihai* year, on the fifth day of the fifth month at noon, the Seven Perfected first received the *Upper Prime Numinous Register* from the Supreme Venerable Jade Dawn Lord. For nine years now, the Seven Perfected have treasured this register to gather spirit and qi, never once neglecting its divine writ.

Now, in the fifth year of the Great Clarity (*taiqing*), the year *xinwei*, on the first day of the fifth month at noon, the Most High Heavenly Treasure Jade Sovereign descended in truth within the Jeweled Palace of Belt Ridge, once more ranking and ordaining the *Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Mysterious Register* for the Seven Perfected, rectifying the titles and positions of its officials and generals.

Golden Radiance said: At that time, the Most High Heavenly Treasure Jade Sovereign spoke from his golden mouth, addressing the Seven Perfected: "This *Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Departments of Generals and Heavenly Officials* was not composed by later scholars. These true beings are the Upper Prime’s soaring, congealed, pure, and numinous life-breath, responding naturally to the luminous course of destiny to become perfected persons. When they don their robes, they naturally wear five-colored flying celestial feathered garments; their forms are adamantine, their bodies over three thousand *zhang* in height. The officials and generals under their command all wear the naturally arising three-colored flying azure feathered immortal robes, ever guarding the Upper Prime of the Nine Heavens to assist the thirty-six True Sovereigns in their governance.

Thus, their method accords with the four images of Heaven and Earth and the three hundred sixty-five degrees of the Jade Pass and the Celestial Pivot. It also mirrors the governance of the Nine Dawns, the Three Luminaries, the Seven Luminants, and the stellar lodges, as well as the nine palaces, eight trigrams, and three hundred sixty-five degrees of the correct positions. It further accords with the inception of the three hundred sixty-five qi of Heaven, Earth, and the four seasons. At the center, it governs the revolutions of the human form, the three hundred sixty-five joints, and the viscera.

Above, it presides over the circulation of the correct qi of Heaven and Earth; in the middle, it sustains the mandate of the Heavenly Thearch and the imperial foundation, the enlightened prosperity of rulers, the illumination of the Three Primes and the imperial course, and the transformation of the worthy kalpa. Below, it rescues the three realms from the multitudes of beings, opens the gate of true Dharma in great radiance, ferries celestial and human beings across the Bridge of Blessings, delivers the eight difficulties from the Sea of Suffering, extricates the three paths from the six destinies, saves the degenerate world through the *Mysterious Register*, wards off heavenly disasters through the numinous officials, delivers the nine breaths through divine merit, protects the myriad bodies with heavenly soldiers, preserves blessings and prosperity through kalpas, dispels the ten evils in the heavenly halls, restrains poisonous ghosts with divine generals, subdues all demons with the heavenly perfected, repels all misfortunes with the numinous clerks, overpowers all spirits with heavenly might, slays all demons with divine power, extinguishes water and fire with numinous wisdom, dissolves foul qi with azure waters, sweeps away clamorous dust with the golden wind, preserves the myriad forms with wondrous qi, cures the hundred diseases with the heavenly physicians, and stabilizes the myriad joints with true essence.

Thus, its merits are all-encompassing, its reach boundless, its method a reflection of the measures of Heaven, Earth, and humanity. It constantly follows the luminous course to descend teachings and deliver beings in the kalpa of decline. It safeguards the realm of non-action for the future. Its Dharma shall flourish in the era of the numinous dragon. When rulers practice the Dao and cultivate virtue, it is their destiny. When the imperial reign is at peace, it is their merit. When the lives of celestial and human beings are not cut short, it is their blessing."

The Most High declared: "At this pinnacle, when the myriad Daoist arts have reached their end, the mysterious model arises, the Great Vehicle circulates, and the celestial years of the myriad beings are preserved, they shall attain equality with the Three Primes. Can this not be called the work of spontaneity, where deliverance is effortless?"

Now, therefore, this preface is composed to clarify its merits. May later worthies, perfected persons, and those who revere and uphold this teaching not fail to practice it accordingly.

**The Upper Prime True Numinous Mysterious Register**

Belonging to the Primordial Heavenly Worthy of the Upper Prime of the Pure and Boundless True, governed by the Ever-Bright Golden Perfection Jade Lads. To the left: the True Person of the Nine Myriad, Nine Thousand, Nine Hundred Ninety-Nine Layers of Flowing Radiance of the Jade Heaven of the Pure True Primordial Qi; to the right: the True Person of the Eight Myriad, Eight Thousand, Eight Hundred Eighty-Eight Layers of Golden Light and Jeweled Brilliance of the Accumulated Yang True Essence Primordial Qi; at the center: the True Person of the Hundred Million Myriad Layers of the Jade Mystery Golden Primordial True Qi of the Boundless Pure and Wondrous Life-Breath of the Mysterious Origin. Together, they lead the Nine Hundred Ninety-Nine Myriad, Nine Thousand, Nine Hundred Ninety-Nine Layers of Qi of the Thirty-Six Grotto-Heavens’ Most True Empty Mystery Venerable Ones. The Seven Perfected of Golden Radiance now lead the Most High Heavenly Treasure Jade Sovereign’s thirty-six governances, overseeing the Flying Celestial Divine Kings of the Ten Directions, collectively administering the Three Primes of the Nine Heavens and the Supreme Ultimate above and below, revolving through the Four Images, and extending to the myriad numina.

Universally proclaimed to the boundless numinous officials of all heavens: the Seven Perfected, upholding the correct Dao, now bestow the *Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the One Hundred Eighty-Three Departments*, along with the ranks and appointments of its generals, soldiers, officers, and clerks. They shall, in accordance with the Dharma, be installed and stabilized within the three hundred sixty-five palaces of the upper, middle, and lower regions of one’s body, safeguarding one’s form as they traverse the Five Directions and Eight Extremes, the Five Marchmounts, famous mountains and great marshes, the Three Rivers and Four Seas, the Yangtze, Huai, Ji, and Zi, the villages, townships, nine provinces, talismanic temples, and village altars, as well as all the deities of empty space. All shall obey the statutes and commands, assisting the nation and sustaining the mandate, controlling and guiding the multitude of spirits, healing the myriad beings, and delivering celestial and human beings.

From the day one receives this register, one must not violate the precepts or breach the covenant, nor engage in licentious sacrifices to the Six Heavens’ ghostly spirits or commit wanton killing. One may only worship one’s ancestors in accordance with the orthodox canon of the Great Perfected. Should one commit licentiousness, theft, or other transgressions, turning from the true to the false, the generals, soldiers, officers, and clerks shall record one’s offenses. One and one’s seven generations of ancestors shall be consigned to the Wind Blade for ten thousand kalpas without reprieve, in strict accordance with the true and luminous imperial decree."

Ritual for the Transmission of the Register and the Investiture of Officials and Soldiers

Next, ascend the altar, face east, and bow twice. Next, offer incense three times. Next, strike the ritual drum twenty-four times. Next, kindle the incense burner.

The Pure and Mysterious, Boundless and Supreme, the True and Lofty Three Heavens, the Primordial Qi of the Boundless Dao, the Most High Lord Lao, the Left and Right Incense Officials, the Flying Immortals and Dragon-Messengers bearing incense, the Heavenly Flying Dragon-Riders and the Jade Lads and Maidens serving the Five Thearchs—twenty-four of each—emerge.

They reverently address the Primordial Heavenly Worthy of the Void and the Natural, as the Seven Perfected burn incense and present the memorial, entrusting the ritual of transmission and ordination. May the Primordial Qi of the Most High’s Ten Directions and True Perfected Ones descend into the bodies of the Seven Perfected, that their petition may ascend directly before the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao and the Most True Jade Emperor.

This done, they bow twice, then kneel reverently before the incense table. The officials emerge to receive the memorial and transmit the ordination.

With solemn care, the Golden Luminance Seven Perfected summon from within their bodies the True Officials and Merit Officers of the Five Agents—two of each—who emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Ascending Mystery—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Orthodox Unity—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Left Mystery and True Luminance—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Right Mystery and Supreme Perfection—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Yang Spirit and Orthodox Unity—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Yin Spirit and Orthodox Unity—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Divine Capital and Healing—two of each—emerge. The Supreme Upper Nine Heavens’ Flying Heavenly White Tiger Envoys bearing the memorial, the Dragon-Riding Immortal Couriers—two of each—emerge.

With solemn care, the Seven Perfected summon from within their bodies the True Official Envoys, the Divine Capital’s Direct True Talisman Officers, and the Envoys leading the Immortal Prefectures—one thousand two hundred of each—who emerge. Robes immaculate, sashes and pendants in order, each arrays the celestial and true feathered regalia, forming ranks on all four sides and eight directions, encamping and guarding left and right, front and back. Their radiance flashes like lightning, sweeping away all inauspicious influences. With dark clarity, they present and transmit the ritual of ordination.

Now, there are so many men and women of such-and-such prefecture, county, village, and hamlet who, having renounced the mundane and turned toward the Mysterious and True, wholeheartedly take refuge in the Three Worthies. They seek to receive the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Registers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ True Numinosity. Today, their celestial titles and ranks are inscribed according to the statutes of the Mysterious Registers. If the register is to be presented, it shall be declared at the proper time; if the ordination is to be transmitted, it shall be declared at such-and-such an hour. Then, at that hour, the Three Primordials and Nine Heavens’ Officials are invoked to transmit the ordination.

Now, a second memorial is reverently presented to the Boundless Dao, the Primordial and Most High Jade Emperor, the Supreme and Most True Great Sage Heavenly Worthy, the Golden Portal Jade Thearch, and the Divine Capital’s True Officials, the Envoys who examine and summon deeds and records. May their true compassion descend, their dark scrutiny overseeing the ordination of these registers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ True Numinosity. May they all, according to their ranks, be transmitted into the bodies of these ordinands, settling in their palaces and guarding their bureaus, encamping and protecting them on all sides. Turning left, nine thousand myriad layers; turning right, nine thousand myriad layers. Guard their bodies, protect their lives, their brilliance shining forth, their majestic influence extending ten thousand miles.

Generals, soldiers, celestial officials, and marshals shall take the same form as these ordinands, their spirits penetrating within and without. The true officials of the lands they tread shall infuse them with qi, overseeing and examining them. All the officials and soldiers shall assist and support them. According to merit, they shall be promoted and rewarded, their loyalty and trust never betrayed. Thus is this memorial presented before the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao and the Most True Jade Emperor.

This done, they bow twice and then present the memorial. When the memorial is concluded, they again invoke and proclaim its merit.

The Golden Luminance Seven Perfected again invoke from within their bodies the multitude of true Merit Officers, celestial officials, marshals, soldiers, chief envoys, and the Flying Heavenly White Tiger Envoys bearing the memorial, the Dragon-Riding Immortal Couriers. The Seven Perfected address the emergent officials, presenting the memorial and petition. The dark hosts of their subordinate true ones return, ascending the void in their chariots, resuming their palaces and bureaus, settling into their proper positions, encamping in heaven and assisting on earth.

They return, preparing the hundred thousand myriad layers of heavenly palaces within the Seven Perfected’s bodies. The true and orthodox each reenter through the vermilion gates and wondrous portals, resuming their ranks. Thus is the petition of the Seven Perfected presented before the Dao.

This done, they bow twice, return to the table, and kneel facing north. The officials emerge once more to transmit the registers of ordination and governance.

The Golden Luminance Seven Perfected again activate from within their bodies the Five True Gentlemen-Officials, the Left and Right Merit-Officers, the Immortal Lords and Dukes, the Direct True Talisman Officers, the Divine Capital’s Jade Gentlemen, the Orthodox Unity and Ascending Mystery Merit Officers, the Chief Envoys who examine and summon, the Envoys who inspect the Immortal Kings, the Flying Heavenly Riders, the Direct True Flying Dragon-Riders, and the Soaring Dragon Couriers—thirty-six of each—who emerge. Robes immaculate, they array the celestial regalia, covering heaven and filling earth, assuming positions left and right. According to the ritual, they oversee, inspect, and transmit the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Registers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ True Numinosity—generals, soldiers, celestial officials, and marshals—into the bodies of these ordinands. They settle and guard the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Passes and Palaces of their joints and bureaus, encamping with a hundred thousand myriad layers, ensuring no errors.

They prepare and encamp these ordinands, uniting them with the multitude of true ones. Thus is the petition of the Seven Perfected presented directly before the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao and the Most True Jade Emperor.

This done, the registers of ordination are read aloud, transmitted by the heavenly palaces. When this is complete, the registers are invoked, then the talismanic texts are invoked, with the prayer:

The Dao opens the true, the Orthodox Dharma stands majestic.
The power of the Great Nonbeing stirs a mighty wind,
From the nonbeing, light arises.
The divine merit of the Great Nonbeing transforms the ten directions.
The True Talismans of the Great Mystery summon the Spirit Kings.
Supreme control and command shatter the myriad calamities,
The Nine Heavens uphold life, the Six Heavens dare not oppose.
All heavens protect and encamp, guarding through endless kalpas.

Hasten! As the Statutes and Ordinances of the Jade Emperor command.

Next, the water texts of the ordination registers are invoked, with the prayer:

The Most High’s azure waters surge from the Celestial River,
Transforming into divine qi like a heavenly net.
Flying and scattering like swords, they slay heavenly demons.
The ghostly soldiers of the five directions—
All who encounter them are dissolved,
Like wind, like fire, extinguishing spirits and sweeping away demons.

Hasten! As the Statutes and Ordinances command.

This done, the ordination registers are transmitted, and the merit is proclaimed. Next, incense is offered three times. They return to the table, face east, and kneel to proclaim the merit.

From the Upper Prime’s Nine Heavens’ Upper Numinous Flying Ascendant Talismanic Destruction of Demonic Shrines Vajra Force Soldiers—two each. Respectfully, so-and-so petitions the Heavenly Officials, submitting one written memorial, beseeching relief from so-and-so’s thousand transgressions and myriad faults—or regarding such-and-such matter. May they command the myriad officials of the Ten Directions’ all heavens, the Eight Extremes, the Five Directions, the Three Origins, the Four Beginnings, the Jiazi cycles, the seventy-two officials, the Red Yang Bing Ding thirty-six officials, and all numinous officials of heaven, earth, mountains, rivers, the Huai, the Ji, the nine rivers, the eight seas—to examine and summon the local Earth Gods and True Officials, the Qi-Recording Community and Hamlet Lords. The memorial shall ascend directly to the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao’s Most True Jade Thearch.

Upon completion, bow twice, then present the memorial. When the memorial concludes, solemnly recite the merit-conferring invocation.

Next, recite the merit-conferring invocation:

The first *jia* stirs the host of perfected beings within the body—Merit Officers, Celestial Officials, Generals, Scribes, Soldiers, Capital Envoys, Flying Celestial White Tigers, Memorial-Conveying Immortal Dragon Riders, and all the Heavenly Officials who emerged at the first *jia*—on behalf of so-and-so, for such-and-such matter, have transmitted this memorial and revealed its memorial tablet to completion.

May so-and-so’s household, by virtue of this merit, open the path to deliver the Nine Mysteries and Seven Ancestors, extricating them from the Five Paths, absolving the Ten Sufferings, Eight Calamities, and Three Wretched Realms of their karmic transgressions. May the living and the dead alike receive salvation and ascension, ascending to heaven to receive blessings, their robes and provisions naturally flowing from the Southern Palace.

May all illnesses afflicting so-and-so’s household, great and small, be cured, or [address] such-and-such matter. May dreams and illusions be dispelled, and truth be firmly established.

May all malevolent spirits, demonic entities, and spectral apparitions—whether the baleful *qi* of the Five Directions, pestilential toxins, cloud-chasing hunters, *wangliang* specters, or any roving bands of inauspicious ghosts—be utterly extinguished from this day forth. May ten thousand misfortunes never arise, and may a hundred blessings adorn and perfect, ensuring eternal supreme fortune.

May all that the first *jia* transforms be transformed, all it governs be healed, and all it subdues be subdued, all jointly guarded and protected.

May the host of perfected Celestial Officials under the first *jia*’s command return, soaring through the void, to their palaces of golden citadels and jade precincts, resuming their stations to pacify heaven and assist earth. May the twelve thousand layers of Celestial Officials and Orthodox Perfected Ones within the first *jia*’s body, each departing from the vermilion gates of wondrous palaces, return to their posts.

The first *jia* has presented this memorial before the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao’s Most True Jade Thearch.

Upon completion, bow twice. Next, tend to the incense burner.

The Left and Right Fragrant Officers, Flying Immortal Courier Dragon Riders, Incense-Bearing Envoys, and Flying Celestial Dragon Riders shall ensure that above the sacred altar and within the tranquil chamber, gold radiance and precious luminosity naturally arise, intermingling with jade’s resplendence and the essence of golden liquid.

May so-and-so’s household enjoy blessings and ease, the world receive grace, and the jade lads and jade maidens of the Ten Directions attend the fragrant smoke, conveying the first *jia*’s memorial directly to the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao’s Most True Jade Thearch.

Upon completion, depart.

The *Jinming* states: The Seven Perfected received the Supreme Mysterious Register, and from the Golden Mouth’s decrees, this ritual was established as a ready-made liturgical model. Together with the transmission protocols and ordinances, they form this single scroll.

The Mysterious Register’s movement perpetually aligns with the Seven Perfected’s natural course, aiding the Thirty-Six Perfected August Ones in their orthodox governance, presiding over the Worthy Kalpa, as it is now.

If the celestial beings of the Ten Directions remain unaware of the myriad Dao’s culmination, let them observe the abolition of false ordinances—then the Three Caverns shall shine forth, the true scriptures shall illuminate with clarity, resplendent and pure, their brilliance as radiant as the sun’s light, like a dharma-mirror.

The Orthodox Dao is in motion; the Dharma Vehicle is at work. Thus, the Cavern Scriptures flourish, the Dharma teachings thrive, and the ten thousand demons are subdued.

At that time, heaven shall no longer accept sacrifices, spirits shall no longer receive offerings, ghosts shall no longer partake of food, malevolent entities shall hide, licentious harm shall vanish, the Six Heavens shall be rectified, and heterodox paths shall submit.

At that time, it shall truly be a cause for celebration—how could the celestial beings of the Ten Directions not rejoice?

Now, this later section is roughly outlined to serve as proof. Transmit this to future worthies, and do not divide this scroll by extracting portions to form separate volumes.

Those who violate this shall incur punishment by the Wind Blade—beware!

If transmission is desired, simply follow this text, and it shall not deviate from the lineage. Take heed and guard against transgression.

The True Decree of the Jade Thearch must not be defied; the Seven Perfected’s scriptural embodiment truly dares not betray the sagely teachings.

The Supreme Perfected of the Great Mystery, the Orthodox Mystery, the Primordial Mystery, and the Boundless Mystery; the True Illuminator Celestial Lord; the Supreme Celestial Lord; the Most High Lord of the Great Dao; the Lord of the Myriad Layers of True Mystery and Primordial *Qi*; the Most High Lord Lao; the Most High Elder; the Nine Elders of the Immortal Capital; and the Lords of the Hundred Thousand Layers of Dao *Qi* and Perfected Celestials—before the True Heavenly Court.

Sixty-one characters.

The Supreme Perfected of the Great Clarity, the Primordial Mystery, and the Boundless Mystery; the True Illuminator and Great Assembly Celestial Worthies; the Supreme Golden Clarity Celestial Worthy; the Supreme Lord of the Myriad Layers of Immortal Mystery and Primordial *Qi* of the Boundless Great Dao; the Lord of the Three Origins and the Hundred Thousand Layers of Dao *Qi*; and the Nine Elders, True Immortals, and Elders beneath the Golden Clarity Gate.

Sixty-one characters.

These two passages are not to be removed from this scroll. As their reading remains incomplete, they are provisionally placed here.

The Great Register is employed afterward, the Lesser Register is employed beforehand.

Here concludes the *Primordial Registers of the Three Hundred and Sixty-Five Divisions of the True Numinous Ones of the Nine Heavens of the Upper Origin*—the Supreme Jade Emperor of the Golden Perfection of Highest Clarity.

chunks.original_text: 上清金真玉皇上元九天真灵三百六十五部元箓 经名：上清金真玉皇上元九天真灵三百六十五部元箓。 简称《上元九天真灵玄箓》。 撰人不详，约出於南北期末或睛唐之际。 假托大上玉晨君授金明七真。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 上清金真玉皇上元九天真灵三百六十五部元箓 金明曰：七真先以癸亥岁五月五日午时，受太上玉晨君上元灵录，於今九载。 七真宝录以摄神气，未尝亏诞神文也。 七真重以今太清五年太岁辛未五月一日午时，高上天宝玉皇降真於带岭琼宫之中，重为七真品定上元九天真灵玄录，官将位号於是正焉。 金明曰：是时高上天宝玉皇金口诀言，告於七真，言此上元九天真灵三百六十五部将军玄录天官者，皆非后学而为之也。 其真即上元飞凝清真生灵妙气，而应自然明运，成为真人矣。 服即自然五色飞天羽衣，形皆金刚，身长三千余丈。 其所部官将者、齐服自然三色飞青羽仙之衣，常镇九天上元，以辅三十六真皇治也。 所以法应天地四象，玉关难玑三百六十五正度之数也。 亦法镇九晨三光七曜星宿，九宫八卦三百六十五度正位也。 亦法天地四时三百六十五气之始也。 中以法镇天人形斡，三百六十五关节脏腑之数也。 上即主运天地正气； 中即扶命天帝皇基、国君明祚，明三元御运，明化於贤劫也； 下拯三界於群生，开真法门於大光，度天人於福桥，济八难於苦海，拔三涂於六道，救疾世於玄录，防天灾於灵官，度九息於神功，卫兆身於天兵，保福祚於历劫，禳十恶於天堂，拥毒鬼於神将，制众魔於天真，却众祸於灵吏，伏众精於天威，戳群妖於神力，灭水火於神智，消秽气於碧水，扫嚣尘於金风，保兆形於妙气，治百病於天医，镇兆关节於真精也。 是以其功无所不周，无所不匝，法象天地人之度量也。 常随明运下教，度人於季劫矣。 保无为於将来也。 其法当兴於灵龙之世也。 尔时国君行道修德，是其运也。 帝祚太平，是其功也。 天人命不夭伤，是其福也。 高上有言，当斯之隆，即是万道势讫，玄范是兴，大乘运行，则保兆天年，得以三元等矣。 可谓自然之功、开度亦复不与为难者哉。 今故序此篇，即以明之功乎。 后贤至人信尚之士，可不奉而行焉。 上元真灵玄录 系清玄无极真上元始天尊，长明金真玉童治，左清真玄气九万九千九百九十九重流明玉天真人、右积阳真精元气八万八千八百八十八重金光宝耀真人、中玄生灵清妙无央真气百千万重玉玄金元真人、都领上景清虚生神妙气九亿九万九千九百九十九重气三十六洞天至真空玄丈人，金明七真子今领高上天宝玉皇三十六治，都监十方飞天神王，总司九天三元太极上下，周回四象，下布万灵，普告无穷诸天灵官，七真奉行正道，上元九天真灵百八十三部玄录，将军兵士将吏等，列位付授，当依法度某身中，安镇形干上中下三百六十五宫府，营卫某身游行，五方八极、五岳名山大泽、三河四海江淮济渍、乡亭九州符庙里社、虚空一切神祇，咸当奉承律令，助国扶命，制御群神，医治万兆，救度天人。 某自受录之日，不得违科犯约，淫祀六天鬼神，无辜杀害，唯得依太真正典，祠家先人。 若有犯淫盗不，背真入伪，为将军兵士将吏所伺札过之日，某及七祖长充风刀，万劫无原，一如真明勅令。

**The Supreme Clarity Golden Perfection Jade Sovereign’s Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Departments**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Clarity Golden Perfection Jade Sovereign’s Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Departments* (abbreviated as *The Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Mysterious Register*).

Author unknown, approximately composed between the late Northern and Southern Dynasties or the early Tang. Falsely attributed to the Supreme Venerable Jade Dawn Lord bestowing it upon the Seven Perfected of Golden Radiance.

One scroll. Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Orthodox Section, Part One.

---

**The Supreme Clarity Golden Perfection Jade Sovereign’s Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Departments**

Golden Radiance said: In the *guihai* year, on the fifth day of the fifth month at noon, the Seven Perfected first received the *Upper Prime Numinous Register* from the Supreme Venerable Jade Dawn Lord. For nine years now, the Seven Perfected have treasured this register to gather spirit and qi, never once neglecting its divine writ.

Now, in the fifth year of the Great Clarity (*taiqing*), the year *xinwei*, on the first day of the fifth month at noon, the Most High Heavenly Treasure Jade Sovereign descended in truth within the Jeweled Palace of Belt Ridge, once more ranking and ordaining the *Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Mysterious Register* for the Seven Perfected, rectifying the titles and positions of its officials and generals.

Golden Radiance said: At that time, the Most High Heavenly Treasure Jade Sovereign spoke from his golden mouth, addressing the Seven Perfected: "This *Upper Prime Nine Heavens True Numinous Register of the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Departments of Generals and Heavenly Officials* was not composed by later scholars. These true beings are the Upper Prime’s soaring, congealed, pure, and numinous life-breath, responding naturally to the luminous course of destiny to become perfected persons. When they don their robes, they naturally wear five-colored flying celestial feathered garments; their forms are adamantine, their bodies over three thousand *zhang* in height. The officials and generals under their command all wear the naturally arising three-colored flying azure feathered immortal robes, ever guarding the Upper Prime of the Nine Heavens to assist the thirty-six True Sovereigns in their governance.

Thus, their method accords with the four images of Heaven and Earth and the three hundred sixty-five degrees of the Jade Pass and the Celestial Pivot. It also mirrors the governance of the Nine Dawns, the Three Luminaries, the Seven Luminants, and the stellar lodges, as well as the nine palaces, eight trigrams, and three hundred sixty-five degrees of the correct positions. It further accords with the inception of the three hundred sixty-five qi of Heaven, Earth, and the four seasons. At the center, it governs the revolutions of the human form, the three hundred sixty-five joints, and the viscera.

Above, it presides over the circulation of the correct qi of Heaven and Earth; in the middle, it sustains the mandate of the Heavenly Thearch and the imperial foundation, the enlightened prosperity of rulers, the illumination of the Three Primes and the imperial course, and the transformation of the worthy kalpa. chunks.original_text: 清玄无极真上三天玄元始炁无极大道太上老君、左右香官、飞仙驿龙乘骑捧香使者、飞天龙骑五帝侍香玉童玉女等，各二十四人出。 上启虚无自然元始天尊，七真正尔烧香奉表，付度法事。 愿得太上十方正真生炁，降七真等身中，所启径上无极大道至真玉皇御前。 毕，即再拜，长跪香案前，出官奉表付度。 谨出金明七真身中五体真官功曹使者，各二人出。 上元九天功曹官，各二人出。 上元九天升玄功曹官，各二人出。 上元九天正一功曹官，各二人出。 上元九天左玄真明功曹官，各二人出。 上元九天右玄太真功曹官，各二人出。 上元九天阳神正一功曹官，各二人出。 上元九天阴神正一功曹官，各二人出。 上元九天仙都治病功曹官，各二人出。 无上上元九天上灵飞天白虎送章仙龙骑吏官，各二人出。 谨出七真身中真官使者、仙都直真符吏、领仙郡官使者，各千二百人出。 严庄整服，冠带垂缨，各整天真羽仪，罗列四面八方，营卫左右前后，流明曜电，扫除不祥，玄鉴玄奏，付度法事。 今有某郡县乡里男女生等如干人，投辞玄真，至心归命三尊，求受上元九天真灵三百六十五部玄录，即日书写条例天官位号，依科玄录，若上刺当言以时刺，若付度即言以某时付度，即以某时拜请三元九天官付度。 今重表上启无极大道元始太上玉皇、无上至真大圣天尊金阙玉帝陛下、仙都真官考召行状都官使者，伏愿真慈下降，玄察监度某等上元九天真灵玄录，皆当依位列度某等身中，安宫镇府，周匝营卫，左转九千万重，右转九千万重，防某等身，护某等命，光明映曜，威风万里。 将军兵士天官将吏，与某同形，神洞内外。 为是所履土地真官，注气监察，考召诸官军等，共相辅佐。 当随功迁赏，不负效信，所启上御无极大道至真玉皇御前。 毕，再拜，便奏章。 章竟，即重勅言奏章功。 金明七真重勅身中众真功曹天官、将吏兵士、都官使者、飞天白虎送章仙龙骑吏等，七真向出官言奏章表事，玄所部众真各回腾虚驾，还复宫府，安镇本位，营天辅地。 回备七真身中百千万重天宫，正真各从朱门妙阙而还职位。 七真所启上御道前。 毕，即再拜回案，向北长跪，重出官，玄即付度治录也。 金明七真重动身中五真郎吏、左右功平仙伯仙公、直真符吏、仙都玉郎、正一升玄功曹、考召都官，条检仙王使者、飞天乘骑、直真飞龙骑、腾龙驿呈飞仙羽骑，各三十六人出。 严庄整服，列侍天仪，盖天弥地方位左右，依法领押监察，列付某等所受上元真灵三百六十五部将军兵士天官将吏，付度某等身中，安镇三百六十五关节宫府，周备亿千万重，勿令错误。 营备某等与众真合同，七真所启径上无极大道至真玉皇御前。 毕，即读度录，天宫付授也。 毕即勅录，次勅录符文，祝曰： 大道开真，正法堂堂，太无威风，无中发光，太无神功，功化十方，太玄真符，摄召神王，无上制御，万祸摧亡，九天扶命，六天敢当，诸天拥护，弥劫相防。 急急如太上玉皇律令。 次勅度录水文，祝曰： 太上碧水涌天河，化为神气如天罗，飞洒如剑斩天魔，五方鬼兵，当者皆消，如风如火，灭精荡妖。 急急如律令。 毕，度录，即言功，次三上香，回案东向，跪言功。

The Pure and Mysterious, Boundless and Supreme, the True and Lofty Three Heavens, the Primordial Qi of the Boundless Dao, the Most High Lord Lao, the Left and Right Incense Officials, the Flying Immortals and Dragon-Messengers bearing incense, the Heavenly Flying Dragon-Riders and the Jade Lads and Maidens serving the Five Thearchs—twenty-four of each—emerge.

May the Primordial Qi of the Most High’s Ten Directions and True Perfected Ones descend into the bodies of the Seven Perfected, that their petition may ascend directly before the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao and the Most True Jade Emperor.

This done, they bow twice, then kneel reverently before the incense table. The officials emerge to receive the memorial and transmit the ordination.

The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens—two of each—emerge. The Merit Officers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ Ascending Mystery—two of each—emerge. Their radiance flashes like lightning, sweeping away all inauspicious influences. With dark clarity, they present and transmit the ritual of ordination.

Now, there are so many men and women of such-and-such prefecture, county, village, and hamlet who, having renounced the mundane and turned toward the Mysterious and True, wholeheartedly take refuge in the Three Worthies. They seek to receive the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Registers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ True Numinosity. Today, their celestial titles and ranks are inscribed according to the statutes of the Mysterious Registers. If the register is to be presented, it shall be declared at the proper time; if the ordination is to be transmitted, it shall be declared at such-and-such an hour. Then, at that hour, the Three Primordials and Nine Heavens’ Officials are invoked to transmit the ordination.

Now, a second memorial is reverently presented to the Boundless Dao, the Primordial and Most High Jade Emperor, the Supreme and Most True Great Sage Heavenly Worthy, the Golden Portal Jade Thearch, and the Divine Capital’s True Officials, the Envoys who examine and summon deeds and records. May their true compassion descend, their dark scrutiny overseeing the ordination of these registers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ True Numinosity. May they all, according to their ranks, be transmitted into the bodies of these ordinands, settling in their palaces and guarding their bureaus, encamping and protecting them on all sides. Turning left, nine thousand myriad layers; turning right, nine thousand myriad layers. Guard their bodies, protect their lives, their brilliance shining forth, their majestic influence extending ten thousand miles.

Generals, soldiers, celestial officials, and marshals shall take the same form as these ordinands, their spirits penetrating within and without. The true officials of the lands they tread shall infuse them with qi, overseeing and examining them. All the officials and soldiers shall assist and support them. According to merit, they shall be promoted and rewarded, their loyalty and trust never betrayed. Thus is this memorial presented before the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao and the Most True Jade Emperor.

This done, they bow twice and then present the memorial. When the memorial is concluded, they again invoke and proclaim its merit.

The Golden Luminance Seven Perfected again invoke from within their bodies the multitude of true Merit Officers, celestial officials, marshals, soldiers, chief envoys, and the Flying Heavenly White Tiger Envoys bearing the memorial, the Dragon-Riding Immortal Couriers. The Seven Perfected address the emergent officials, presenting the memorial and petition. The dark hosts of their subordinate true ones return, ascending the void in their chariots, resuming their palaces and bureaus, settling into their proper positions, encamping in heaven and assisting on earth.

They return, preparing the hundred thousand myriad layers of heavenly palaces within the Seven Perfected’s bodies. The true and orthodox each reenter through the vermilion gates and wondrous portals, resuming their ranks. Thus is the petition of the Seven Perfected presented before the Dao.

This done, they bow twice, return to the table, and kneel facing north. The officials emerge once more to transmit the registers of ordination and governance.

The Golden Luminance Seven Perfected again activate from within their bodies the Five True Gentlemen-Officials, the Left and Right Merit-Officers, the Immortal Lords and Dukes, the Direct True Talisman Officers, the Divine Capital’s Jade Gentlemen, the Orthodox Unity and Ascending Mystery Merit Officers, the Chief Envoys who examine and summon, the Envoys who inspect the Immortal Kings, the Flying Heavenly Riders, the Direct True Flying Dragon-Riders, and the Soaring Dragon Couriers—thirty-six of each—who emerge. Robes immaculate, they array the celestial regalia, covering heaven and filling earth, assuming positions left and right. According to the ritual, they oversee, inspect, and transmit the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Registers of the Upper Nine Heavens’ True Numinosity—generals, soldiers, celestial officials, and marshals—into the bodies of these ordinands. They settle and guard the Three Hundred Sixty-Five Passes and Palaces of their joints and bureaus, encamping with a hundred thousand myriad layers, ensuring no errors.

They prepare and encamp these ordinands, uniting them with the multitude of true ones. Thus is the petition of the Seven Perfected presented directly before the Imperial Presence of the Boundless Dao and the Most True Jade Emperor.

This done, the registers of ordination are read aloud, transmitted by the heavenly palaces. When this is complete, the registers are invoked, then the talismanic texts are invoked, with the prayer:

The Dao opens the true, the Orthodox Dharma stands majestic.
The power of the Great Nonbeing stirs a mighty wind,
From the nonbeing, light arises.
The divine merit of the Great Nonbeing transforms the ten directions.
The True Talismans of the Great Mystery summon the Spirit Kings.
Supreme control and command shatter the myriad calamities,
The Nine Heavens uphold life, the Six Heavens dare not oppose.
All heavens protect and encamp, guarding through endless kalpas.

Hasten! As the Statutes and Ordinances of the Jade Emperor command.

Next, the water texts of the ordination registers are invoked, with the prayer:

The Most High’s azure waters surge from the Celestial River,
Transforming into divine qi like a heavenly net.
Flying and scattering like swords, they slay heavenly demons.
The ghostly soldiers of the five directions—
All who encounter them are dissolved,
Like wind, like fire, extinguishing spirits and sweeping away demons.

Hasten! As the Statutes and Ordinances command.

This done, the ordination registers are transmitted, and the merit is proclaimed. Next, incense is offered three times. They return to the table, face east, and kneel to proclaim the merit.

chunks.original_text: 右如干人今投辞，请受上元九天三百六十五部玄录，请给谨状。 某郡县乡里男女童子，年如干岁。 右如干人今投辞，请受无上九天玉仙一将军童子玄录，请给馑状。 钱二百，　薪五束。 右受三百六十五部玄录信物如左。 钱二百，　薪一束。 右受童子玄录信物如左。 清玄无极正一玄气系天尊，长明金真玉皇治，左清真玄气九万九千九百九十九重流明玉天真人、右积阳元气八万八千八百八十八重金玄宝光真人，中玄生灵清妙无央真气百千万重玉玄金元真人，都领上景清虚自然生神妙气九亿九万九千九百九十九重气、领三十六洞天至真虚玄丈人、领高上玉皇三十六真皇正治都监十方无纲玉司法王，金明七真子稽首再拜高上真威正气。 谨案元科，今有男女生等，先蒙师真启拔，赐署天官治职，进叨上道三洞妙法，非分佩恩宝衔罔极大道洪泽。 但某生长浊俗，命属三灾，为非染恶，习与性成，身心不谨，负越禁诚，罪积丘岳，过深渊海，自罹咎衅莫大之愆。 伏闻大道慈真普育，恩备十方，海纳万流，恩沾三界，六道光润，无物不备。 某等贪进忘退，无以自济，谨以投辞玄真，归命三尊，乞受上元九天真灵三百六十五部玄录，将军兵士天官将吏，永济长河之津。 佩法之后，当依科奉行，不敢有违。 七真见某等稽颡不止，即加署天官。 谨依某等郡县乡里姓名年纪，即日逆刺上言章表天官位号，如前事状。 伏愿无极大道无上金阙玉帝至真大圣，降动三天仙都署仙玉郎、九天真王监真度命使者，摄召天官，分别正位，克以今月某日付度某等，依法拜署，竭言上刺，奏御无极大道御前。 金明七真稽首再拜白刺，上诣太元上九天金阙玉帝考召清真正气。 太岁某月日子时，金明七真於某郡县乡里白刺。 太玄上九天无上真明大众至真降遣。 右度录章仪。 清玄无极正一玄气系天尊某治气金明七真，稽首再拜高上真威正气，谨按玄科，今有男女生等如干人，投辞稽颡，求受上元九天真灵三百六十五部玄录。 七真以今月某日，依科署某等天官列位，如前事状，逆刺表章，上御道前。 伏愿无极大道至真大圣太上天尊，垂神玄监，慈真降下，开度某等得济苦海之难，永为身宝。 愿勅九天高上玉皇监真使者、玄都仙皇监盟玉郎使者、十方飞天开度玉司神仙羽郎使者、无上三天金阙玉帝消灾道真公使者，一合来下，天真乘骑盖天弥地，流精电转，扫荡六天群非，摄召三界神官，共下监临，开度某等上元九天真灵三百六十五部玄录，将军兵士天官将吏，条列付度，永镇某等身中三百六十五宫室，元令失次。 七真伏地，拜上纸章一通。 恩惟无极大道无上金阙玉帝至真大圣，哀愍七真所表，随事分别清真玄气生灵神化之功，天真官属付度某等，常审营卫，流光电转，布在宫室，长为某等身宝。 谨因直真符吏、飞龙乘骑飞天玉郎、送章飞真白虎神龙骑吏等，各千二百，驿章文上奏无上至真玉帝御前。 金明七真稽首再拜以闻。 金明七真子，属金相洞明玉国九真乡上景金轮里。 泰清如法。 太岁年月日子时，於某里中拜上。 上元九天真灵出官仪 百姓救急请福上章通用。 次入静东向再拜。 夜即北向言奏。 次长跪案前三捻香。 毕即起立。
